person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The president had only two formal , full-blown news conferences last year , one in January and one after he won re-election in November , although he had various other limited sessions with the press .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| the president |
| he |

In this paragraph, the two "Person" entities are "the president" and "he". These entities refer to the same person, who is the president mentioned at the beginning of the paragraph. The pronoun "he" is used later in the paragraph to refer to the same person.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| the president |

In this paragraph, there is only one clear "Person" entity, which is "the president". The pronoun "he" also refers to the same person, but it is not a clear and precise reference on its own, so it is not included in the table. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "last year", "one in January", "one after he won re-election in November", and "various other limited sessions with the press", do not clearly refer to people, so they are not included in the table.
